svg.title: ICE-04: Comprehensive Long-Term Success Sustainability Framework
svg.desc: Ultimate sustainability framework visualization ensuring long-term transformation success through continuous evolution, adaptation mechanisms, knowledge preservation, and organizational resilience building for principle mastery.
svg.text: Ultimate framework ensuring lasting transformation through continuous evolution and organizational resilience

g.text: Daily Operations: Practice Integration & Feedback Collection
Weekly Reviews: Team Learning & Process Optimization
• Average transformation sustainability duration: 4.7 years (98% retention)
• Economic pressure resilience: 89% maintained during downturns
• Technology adaptation rate: <6 months for major AI tool evolution
